title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8055.00 - General
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8055.00 - General

State Regulations
(a) IR 287. The
eastbound and westbound roadways of IR 287 between Thruway exit 8 and IR 95, exit 21, in the Cities of Rye and White Plains, Villages of Elmsford and Port

Chester and Towns of Greenburgh, Harrison and Rye. (b) IR 684. The northbound and southbound
roadways of IR 684 between IR 287 and the Westchester-Putnam county line in the

Towns of Harrison, North Castle, Mount Kisco, Bedford, Lewisboro and North

Salem. (c) IR 287. The northbound
and southbound roadways of IR 287 between the New York City line and the

Westchester-Rockland county line in the City of Yonkers, Villages of Ardsley
and Tarrytown and Town of Greenburgh. (d) IR 95. The northbound and southbound
roadways of IR 95 between the New York City line and the New York - Connecticut
state line in the Cities of New Rochelle and Rye, Villages of Pelham Manor, Larchmont, Mamaroneck and Port Chester, Towns of Mamaroneck and

Harrison. (e) IR 87. The northbound
and southbound roadways of IR 87 between the New York City line and the

Westchester-Rockland county line in the City of Yonkers, Villages of Ardsley
and Tarrytown and Town of Greenburgh. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8055.00

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
